verses.text: Tzin xajanej Jehová, yujto ix yab' in lesal ayic ix in tevi d'ay.
Yujto ix yab' tas ix in k'an d'ay, yuj chi' ol val in b'a d'ay yacb'an pitzan into.
Ijan val ix in yamchaj yuj chamel. Ix ja syaelal chamel d'ayin. A ilk'olal yed' yaelal ix javi d'a vib'anh.
Ichato chi' ix valan in b'a d'a Jehová. Ix in tevi d'ay yic syak'an b'oxoc in k'ool.
A Jehová, tojol toni, tz'ok' sk'ol d'ayonh. A co Diosal, yelxo val te nivan svach'k'olal.
A stanhvan eb' emnaquil yeq'ui. Ayic toxo ix el vip, a ix in colani.
Ayxo in junk'olal ticnaic svab'i, yujto a Jehová vach' ix yutej sk'ol d'ayin.
Maj in scha chamlaj, ix in scol d'a in cusk'olal, maj in schalaj telvoc.
Yacb'an pitzan into ol in k'anab'ajej.
Ix vak'och Jehová yipoc in k'ool, d'a scal in nivan yaelal ix valani: Te ya ayin, xin chi.
Manhxo animaoc vaj svab'i, yuj chi' ix vala' to masanil eb' anima, max yal-laj cak'anoch tas syal eb' yipoc co k'ool.
¿Tas ol vutej vak'an spac masanil svach'k'olal Jehová ix yak' d'ayin?
Ol vik'cot vino ofrendail d'ay yuj vak'an yuj diosal d'ay, yujto ix in scolo'.
A d'a yichanh masanil schonhab' ol vaq'uelk'och tas ix val d'ay.
Te nivan yelk'och d'a yichanh Jehová ayic scham junoc mach yicxo.
Mamin Jehová, a in ton tic, a checab' in. A ach ix in a coleli, yuj chi' libre in ticnaic.
Ol vak' in silab' yuj ak'oj yuj diosal d'ayach yuj spacoc a vach'k'olal. Ol val in b'a d'ayach.
Mamin Jehová, ol vaq'uelk'och in ti' d'ayach d'a yichanh masanil eb' a chonhab',
d'a yamaq'uil a templo d'a snanhal chonhab' Jerusalén. Scal vach' lolonel d'ayach Jehová.
